lose:
今日A couple of hours after your death
the big asteroids collided with your
home planet. You have failed.

You have died but at least you saved
your home planet.

You have died but at least you saved
your home planet.
win:
After a long and valiant journey, your
life has finally met its end. However,
your home planet was saved in the process,
leaving your name to fade into legend.
quit:
You managed to convince the entire
population of your home planet that you
are the most fitting pilot of them all.
With a spirit of self-sacrifice and
unmatched bravery, you were supposed to
fight up until the very end. You sure as
hell fooled everyone, and now they are
gone along with you.

TUR Flagship alt.info: Being the posterboy of "The Unknown Resistance", the Flagship carries their banner with pride, boosting the army's morale! Through unknown technology, the flag even waves to the non-existing wind. The Flagship is usually accompanied by the Flagship guards.

TUR Mothership alt.info: The Mothership is the largest battlecruiser in "The Unknown Resistance", acting as their final trump card and boasting a powerful arsenal. This ship was once chased down by the legendary hero when he realized that there was more than giant asteroids threatening your home planet.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: What was that just now!?

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: It seems as if though some unknown force is trying to stop you from completing your mission!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: Whatever happens out there, do not let them succeed!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: You are about to enter a comet field. Be careful!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: We have detected large structures ahead. They seem to have been deployed by the enemy!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: You are entering a meteor field!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: How are you holding up so far? It shouldn't be too long until you reach the giant asteroids. Just be sure to stack up on heavy weapons before you reach them.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: That banner... Could this be their leader?

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: Hopefully this means that their forces are growing thin.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: It seems odd that the flagship guards do not travel alongside their leader...

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: Be careful pilot! We are detecting high sources of energy within this enemy! This might be their final trump card!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: This is it. It all depends on whether or not you have the offensive capabilities to tear them down. Good luck.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: All four asteroids have been annihilated! You did it!
While you heard your comrades celebrate through the radio, you had a feeling deep down that told you the mission was far from over.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: What? You're not returning yet? Are you saying that there might be more of "The Unknown Resistance" out there?

dialogs.title: SEG HQ
dialogs.message: I suppose that cutting the snake's head off would be the optimal solution... Very well, if you take on the burden of eliminating this threat, then you can count on our support!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: We are detecting several enemies carrying heavy explosive weapons ahead. You were right after all.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: High amounts of enemy ships are coming your way.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: It's worse than we thought... They might be rallying their entire fleet against you!

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: Try to take them out as fast as you can to stop them from overtaking you.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: That seems to have been the last of them...

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: Are you alright? That battle must have taken its toll on you...

dialogs.title: SEG HQ
dialogs.message: There's a station up ahead so be sure to make use of your GC.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: Hiding behind their massive army, this ship in particular seems to be of great importance.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ:
dialogs.message: There can't possibly be more after that... You should return home.
You told your comrades that you would continue to scout ahead for a while before turning back.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ
dialogs.message: You're pretty far away right now, just make sure that we won't lose contact with you.

dialogs.title: SEG HQ
dialogs.message: H-*buzzing noises*, I think yo-*buzzing noises*
Despite venturing far enough to lose communication with your comrades, you continued on.
What was driving you at this point?
You had already fulfilled your mission and more.
Yet despite that...
You did not waver.
Almost as if you could tell what was to come... You decided that this was the right choice.
It was then that you noticed it. At the time, you felt only a dull sense of pain throughout your body.
The pain continued to increase. It was at this moment that your vision began to fade.

lose:
Despite posing as a legendary hero, you stooped low and tried to save your
home planet at the expense of innocent lives residing within humble stations.
After committing these severe crimes, you were rightfully brought to justice.
However, your home planet was left without protection and met its end shortly after.

dialogs.title: L.S.P.A.:
dialogs.message: Stop right there, criminal scum!

dialogs.title: L.S.P.A.:
dialogs.message: By attacking and destroying neutral stations, you have mercilessly killed innocent civilians inhabiting said stations. All for your own petty self-interests!

dialogs.title: L.S.P.A.:
dialogs.message: These actions violate against one of the fundamental intergalactic treaties of war! Therefore, the L.S.P.A. has sentenced you to death!
